desc: Mirabai Living is home to a brilliant collection of crystals, jewelry, statuary, scents, yoga and meditation supplies and other soulful provisions for serene and mindful living. The treasures you'll find at Mirabai are not merely beautiful. They also reflect an energy that is protective, uplifting and nurturing.

layout.text: Soulful Treasures.  Mirabai is home to a brilliant collection of crystals, jewelry, statuary, scents, meditation supplies and other uplifting provisions for serene and centered living.
